common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this API to update the address of a shop.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Cannot set inbound pickup address for this address.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Inbound pickup address cannot be the same as Shopee warehouse address.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Inbound pickup address must be in São Paulo state.

error_list.name: NOT_ALLOW_TO_EDIT_ADDRESS_REGION
error_list.description: The param is invalid. not allow to edit address region.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

Unique identifier for the address. You can get the address_id via v2.logistics.get_address_list.

","name":"address_id","sample":"123456","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"ikGKhb"},{"description":"

The region of the address.


Note: Do not allow to update the region of the address.

","name":"region","sample":"Brazil","type":"string","required":"False","key":"hbjQiNX"},{"description":"

The state of the address.

","name":"state","sample":"SP","type":"string","required":"False","key":"DDSbjER"},{"description":"

The city of the address.

","name":"city","sample":"São Paulo","type":"string","required":"False","key":"MrFPesd"},{"description":"

The district of the address.

","name":"district","sample":"Pinheiros","type":"string","required":"False","key":"nNwRWty"},{"description":"

The town of the address.

","name":"town","sample":"Rua dos Pinheiros","type":"string","required":"False","key":"rSNQnSt"},{"description":"

The detailed address description of the address.

","name":"address","sample":"123 Rua dos Pinheiros Apt 45","type":"string","required":"False","key":"fyzdBE"},{"description":"

The zipcode of the address.

","name":"zipcode","sample":"05422-001","type":"string","required":"False","key":"MBGYrEz"},{"description":"

Recipient’s name at this address.

","name":"name","sample":"Carlos Silva","type":"string","required":"False","key":"eZCdzMP"},{"description":"

Contact phone number for the recipient.

","name":"phone","sample":"+55-11-91234-5678","type":"string","required":"False","key":"RiCTydX"},{"description":"

Geolocation information for the address. 


Type: JSON string


Note: 

1) To clear existing geo info, pass \"\" or {}.

2) To keep existing geo info, do not include this field.

3) The JSON may include optional fields:

- formattedAddress (string): full formatted address.

- region (object) – contains latitude and longitude as floats.

- user_verified (boolean) – whether the geolocation is verified by the user.
- user_adjusted (boolean) – whether the geolocation was adjusted by the user.

","name":"geo_info","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"ewNziEM"}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"NOT_ALLOW_TO_EDIT_ADDRESS_REGION","type":"string","required":null,"key":"eMHEziT"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"The param is invalid. not allow to edit address region.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"cAXttXY"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"6745b892295d750abf83a29430510400","type":"string","required":null,"key":"KzyEDcN"}]}
request_sample:
[{"type":"Payload","value":"{
	"address_id": 123456,
	"region": "Brazil",
	"state": "SP",
	"city": "São Paulo",
	"district": "Pinheiros",
	"town": "Rua dos Pinheiros",
	"address": "123 Rua dos Pinheiros Apt 45",
	"zipcode": "05422-001",
	"name": "Carlos Silva",
	"phone": "+55-11-91234-5678",
	"geo_info": "-"
}"},{"type":"Java","value":"Unirest.setTimeouts(0, 0);
HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/logistics/update_address?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp")
.header("Content-Type","application/json")
.body("{
   \"address\": \"123 Rua dos Pinheiros Apt 45\",
   \"address_id\": 123456,
   \"city\": \"São Paulo\",
   \"district\": \"Pinheiros\",
   \"geo_info\": \"-\",
   \"name\": \"Carlos Silva\",
   \"phone\": \"+55-11-91234-5678\",
   \"region\": \"Brazil\",
   \"state\": \"SP\",
   \"town\": \"Rua dos Pinheiros\",
   \"zipcode\": \"05422-001\"
}")
.asString();"},{"type":"PHP","value":"<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/logistics/update_address?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "address": "123 Rua dos Pinheiros Apt 45",
    "address_id": 123456,
    "city": "São Paulo",
    "district": "Pinheiros",
    "geo_info": "-",
    "name": "Carlos Silva",
    "phone": "+55-11-91234-5678",
    "region": "Brazil",
    "state": "SP",
    "town": "Rua dos Pinheiros",
    "zipcode": "05422-001"
}',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;
"},{"type":"cURL","value":"curl --location --request POST 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/logistics/update_address?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
   "address": "123 Rua dos Pinheiros Apt 45",
   "address_id": 123456,
   "city": "São Paulo",
   "district": "Pinheiros",
   "geo_info": "-",
   "name": "Carlos Silva",
   "phone": "+55-11-91234-5678",
   "region": "Brazil",
   "state": "SP",
   "town": "Rua dos Pinheiros",
   "zipcode": "05422-001"
}'
"},{"type":"Python","value":"import requests
import json

url = "https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/logistics/update_address?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp"

payload=json.dumps({
  "address": "123 Rua dos Pinheiros Apt 45",
  "address_id": 123456,
  "city": "São Paulo",
  "district": "Pinheiros",
  "geo_info": "-",
  "name": "Carlos Silva",
  "phone": "+55-11-91234-5678",
  "region": "Brazil",
  "state": "SP",
  "town": "Rua dos Pinheiros",
  "zipcode": "05422-001"
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}
response = requests.RPCRequest("POST",url,headers=headers, data=payload, allow_redirects=False)

print(response.text)
"}]
